title: Wunderland
description: A SECOND CHANCE, FRIENDS TO LOVERS ROMANCE...Twenty-one-year old Simone thinks she’s finally gotten over her breakup with her high school flame, Ryan Mulligan. The emerald-eyed boy who has haunted her dreams since she was a teen. That is, until she sees him at her best friend’s birthday party, and their love is reignited. As they become reacquainted, Simone and Ryan’s bond grows stronger and stronger. But while Ryan is convinced they are soulmates, Simone’s heart is incapable of accepting his love.When the past resurfaces, bringing along its dark secrets, Simone retreats. Consumed by past hurt and longing, she makes the heart-wrenching decision for them to part ways.Will the darkness ever vanish? What if she could do it all over? Would she make the same decisions? How many chances do you get to rewrite your wrongs? How many shots does one get with their true love?
author: Scarlett Se Leva
